rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究分析了老年人因 COVID-19 出院后的死亡风险截至 2023 年 6 月，已有超过 110 万美国人死于 COVID-19。 65 岁以上的成年人（仅占总人口的 16%）占美国 COVID-19 死亡人数的 75% 以上，且住院率是年轻人的三倍，凸显了该人群的脆弱性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Study-analyzes-risk-of-death-after-hospital-discharge-with-COVID-19-among-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/Study-analyzes-risk-of-death-after-hospital-discharge-with-COVID-19-among-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66df0b2c-d96c-4110-91de-9687237ed1e2 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 00:15:10 -0400 Study analyzes risk of death after hospital discharge with COVID-19 among older adults
研究发现，第三剂可增强针对 SARS-CoV-2 病毒变种的交叉保护移植受者必须终生服用免疫抑制药物以防止排斥反应，但这些药物可能会损害疫苗的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/A-third-dose-boosted-cross-protection-against-SARS-CoV-2-viral-variants-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230811/A-third-dose-boosted-cross-protection-against-SARS-CoV-2-viral-variants-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=087ce215-50e5-4be4-90f6-3dd5cc4f4341 Fri, 11 Aug 2023 00:09:22 -0400 A third dose boosted cross-protection against SARS-CoV-2 viral variants, finds study
大脑发育与自闭症谱系障碍的出现有关耶鲁大学领导的一项新研究表明，大脑发育开始几周后出现的两种不同的神经发育异常与自闭症谱系障碍的出现有关，在该研究中，研究人员从被诊断患有该疾病的男孩的干细胞中开发出了大脑类器官。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Brain-development-linked-to-the-emergence-of-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Brain-development-linked-to-the-emergence-of-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82ecf84c-a718-4b7b-b99a-683158e420ff Thu, 10 Aug 2023 23:58:21 -0400 Brain development linked to the emergence of autism spectrum disorder
血糖水平升高的男性和女性患心血管疾病的风险更大一项新的研究表明，即使血糖水平低于糖尿病阈值，血糖水平升高的男性和女性患心血管疾病的风险也会增加 30-50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Men-and-women-with-elevated-blood-sugar-levels-have-greater-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Men-and-women-with-elevated-blood-sugar-levels-have-greater-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db79035a-fa13-47c1-9d15-329dca294f44 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 23:22:59 -0400 Men and women with elevated blood sugar levels have greater risk of cardiovascular diseases
研究探索使用现有药物彻底改变癌症治疗在最近发表在《基因与疾病》杂志上的一项研究中，Lu 领导的研究小组探索了使用 FDA 批准的高血压药物和 EMA 批准的止咳药物彻底改变癌症治疗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Study-explores-the-use-of-existing-medicines-to-revolutionize-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Study-explores-the-use-of-existing-medicines-to-revolutionize-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bac21db6-24ad-4400-afcd-407e9be05707 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 23:18:19 -0400 Study explores the use of existing medicines to revolutionize cancer treatment
社区卫生工作者提高偏远马达加斯加的儿童疫苗接种率马达加斯加是世界上最贫穷的国家之一，许多人获得医疗保健的机会有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Community-health-workers-boost-child-vaccination-rates-in-remote-Madagascar.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Community-health-workers-boost-child-vaccination-rates-in-remote-Madagascar.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=012b40fa-2b58-4417-9294-ba6df3558d43 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 23:14:09 -0400 Community health workers boost child vaccination rates in remote Madagascar
多样化的肠道微生物组可能有助于儿童在干细胞移植中存活下来意大利的研究人员首次表明，在接受供体干细胞移植的儿童中，移植前肠道中存在多种微生物，可以显着提高患者的总体生存率并减少并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Diverse-gut-microbiome-may-help-children-survive-stem-cell-transplant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Diverse-gut-microbiome-may-help-children-survive-stem-cell-transplant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a95988dd-053a-456b-924d-d5aa4c98ab9a Thu, 10 Aug 2023 23:04:01 -0400 Diverse gut microbiome may help children survive stem cell transplant
治疗心脏病的药物可提高黑色素瘤治疗的功效纳瓦拉生物医学研究中心（纳瓦拉潘普洛纳）、CSIC-UMH 神经科学研究所（巴伦西亚社区圣琼达拉坎特）和巴塞罗那 IRB（加泰罗尼亚巴塞罗那）进行的一项合作研究表明，雷诺嗪是一种目前用于治疗心脏病的药物，在黑色素瘤小鼠模型中，它可以提高目前治疗黑色素瘤的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/A-drug-for-heart-conditions-improves-efficacy-of-melanoma-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/A-drug-for-heart-conditions-improves-efficacy-of-melanoma-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3148f78-57d1-4c09-a1ce-b2ba4a703bd5 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 23:00:00 -0400 A drug for heart conditions improves efficacy of melanoma therapies
发现缺血性中风后大脑修复的新机制缺血性中风后，患者经常会出现功能下降，特别是由于大脑损伤后难以再生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-mechanism-discovered-for-brain-repair-after-ischemic-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/New-mechanism-discovered-for-brain-repair-after-ischemic-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17dd3786-7b83-4e66-a66a-0cb63c36210c Thu, 10 Aug 2023 22:44:02 -0400 New mechanism discovered for brain repair after ischemic stroke
机器学习可以准确预测帕金森病的亚型弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和伦敦大学学院皇后广场神经病学研究所的研究人员与科技公司Faculty AI合作，证明机器学习可以利用源自患者的干细胞图像准确预测帕金森病的亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Machine-learning-can-accurately-predict-subtypes-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230810/Machine-learning-can-accurately-predict-subtypes-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=947d7786-5831-4b3b-8605-ca50817bde66 Thu, 10 Aug 2023 22:32:28 -0400 Machine learning can accurately predict subtypes of Parkinson's disease
